title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct series for y' OR for the correct series for xf(x)

y ′ =− 2x 3! + 4 x 3 5! − 6 x 5 7! +...+ (−1) n 2n x 2n−1 (2n+1)! +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5E5D@

1 point is earned for the correct series for xy' OR for identifying the series as sin x

x y ′ =− 2 x 2 3! + 4 x 4 5! − 6 x 6 7! +...+ (−1) n 2n x 2n (2n+1)! +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5EC6@

OR

xy = xf ( x ) = x − x 3 3 ! + ... + ( − 1 ) n 1 ( 2 n + 1 ) ! x 2 n + 1 + ... = sinx

1 point is earned for the correct series for xy' + y OR for handling xy' + y

x y ′ +y=1−( 2 3! + 1 3! ) x 2 +( 4 5! + 1 5! ) x 4 −( 6 7! + 1 7! ) x 6 +... + (−1) n ( 2n (2n+1)! + 1 (2n+1)! ) x 2n +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7812@

1 point is earned for identifying the series as cos x OR for making the correct connection to cos x

= 1 − 1 2 ! x 2 + 1 4 ! x 4 − 1 6 ! x 6 + ... + ( − 1 ) n ( 2 n ) ! x 2 n + ... = cosx

OR

x y ′ +y=(xy ) ′ =(sinx ) ′ =cosx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4978@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct series for y' OR for the correct series for xf(x)

y ′ =− 2x 3! + 4 x 3 5! − 6 x 5 7! +...+ (−1) n 2n x 2n−1 (2n+1)! +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5E5D@

OR

xy = xf ( x ) = x − x 3 3 ! + ... + ( − 1 ) n 1 ( 2 n + 1 ) ! x 2 n + 1 + ... = sinx

1 point is earned for the correct series for xy' + y OR for handling xy' + y

x y ′ +y=1−( 2 3! + 1 3! ) x 2 +( 4 5! + 1 5! ) x 4 −( 6 7! + 1 7! ) x 6 +... + (−1) n ( 2n (2n+1)! + 1 (2n+1)! ) x 2n +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7812@

1 point is earned for identifying the series as cos x OR for making the correct connection to cos x

= 1 − 1 2 ! x 2 + 1 4 ! x 4 − 1 6 ! x 6 + ... + ( − 1 ) n ( 2 n ) ! x 2 n + ... = cosx

OR

x y ′ +y=(xy ) ′ =(sinx ) ′ =cosx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4978@
